mapper.insert: insert into guestboards (hostid, gid, content) values (#{hostid}, #{gid}, #{content})
mapper.select: select g.gbid, g.hostid, g.gid, g.content, g.created_at, g.updated_at, p.nickname from guestboards g join profiles p on g.gid = p.mid where g.hostid = #{hostid} order by created_at desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{limit} rows only
mapper.update: update guestboards set content = #{content}, updated_at = sysdate where gbid = #{gbid}
